summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Plat 232W, page 26 of the Official land Use Map to rezone property located at 936 through 946 North 103rd Street from Lowrise 2 (L2) to Lowrise 3 (L3) and accepting such Property Use and Development Agreement as may be considered necessary in connection therewith. (Petition of Donald Svetich, C.F. 301440, Appl. 9602480)
